page.title: 09Vandalism
page.content: We have had a lot of vandalism in our school.For instance our classroom has been vandalised.The intruders got in through the storeroom and threw paint all over the place.They went up the corridor as well and pulled all the paintings down that class 1 had done.They also emptied all class 3 children's books.Quite recently they got in the staffroom and took all the books out of the glass cabinet and threw those around and left the taps on which soaked the dressing-up clothes.They also cut the telephone cable. I think the people that do it must be mad.They should clean up the mess that they've made,if they are ever caught.
